channel.title: Problem with running the server (File not found)
channel.description:
Every time I go to run my base source, brezzy, I get this: [code]Br33zy 2.0 - Created by Br33zy ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... npc.cfg: file not found. drops... npcdrops.cfg: file not found. spawn list...autospawn.cfg: file not found. done! item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. objects.cfg: file not found. [/code]
I've tried moving the files out of the config folder, changing the path, and every other way that you could imagine and it still just can't find the files. Why could this be??

item.title: Problem with running the server (File not found)
item.dc:creator: @Asamin Asamin
item.description:
@Asamin wrote:

I can log into it fine and move around but none of the things that are in any of those files work. For instance, my weapon gives no bonuses.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 02:13:22 pm[/size][hr]Sorry about the double post but I just tried something else that didn’t work. I dragged the entire file to the window, copying the whole path, and it still didn’t work.

EDIT: I GOT IT!!! W00T! There was a part that looked in the config folder that had it as config\ and on mac it is config/

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with running the server (File not found)

item.title: Problem with running the server (File not found)
item.dc:creator: @Asamin Asamin
item.description:
@Asamin wrote:

Every time I go to run my base source, brezzy, I get this:

[code]Br33zy 2.0 - Created by Br33zy

Loading npcs… npc.cfg: file not found.
drops… npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
spawn list…autospawn.cfg: file not found.
done!
item.cfg: file not found.
globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
doors.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
objects.cfg: file not found.
[/code]

I’ve tried moving the files out of the config folder, changing the path, and every other way that you could imagine and it still just can’t find the files. Why could this be??
